website_summaries.verdict: Attention-grabbing batting gloves that feature names of kids' favorite big league players.
pros: Extremely flexible batting glove, especially in the key areas over the knuckles and along the side
No seams in the palm area for maximum comfort
Offered in seven different color combinations and multiple youth sizes, featuring one of three different Major League players
Has a soft feel that doesn't hinder your grip or swing
cons: More likely to suffer tears when they're wet

customer_reviews.title: good but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: looks great, feels great with a nice grip . these gloves are some of the nicest looking and best fitting, however the durability is not the best. i only use these for games and rarely in the cage. when you start to sweat in these things the gloves start to form perfectly in your hands, but with the sweat comes the tears/holes. they last about 80 to 100 ABs. if you can get these at 30 bucks they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Withstands hours of punishment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these now for countless hours during both cage and tee work, and they hold up nicely with maintaining excellent protection. I use my hands in a different profession and these have given me exactly what I’ve needed.
customer_reviews.author: BMT 216A

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Franklin gloves. He has been using them for the past 4 years. One pair per year. But I will say now that my kid is 15 these gloves ripped after spring and summer and a new for fallball and done. I have to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Dager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glove
customer_reviews.text: Second time my 13 yr old son bought these gloves. Loves them! He plays Club Ball year round so he's always using them, yet with all the wear and tear they lasted quite a while before it was time for a new pair. My son has tried many different gloves but these are the best. When it was time for a new pair he didn't hesitate before asking for these gloves again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bezuhov

customer_reviews.title: for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the gym but now just use them at home for my common weights - work perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Molina

customer_reviews.title: The are very comfortable. She plays softball pretty much year around and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for my 14 yr old daughter and she loves them. The are very comfortable. She plays softball pretty much year around and the CFX are the only brand we have bought that lasts over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and looking batting glove
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and looking batting glove. My son loves them and will now only wear Franklin CFX Pro style gloves. He loves the fact that the gloves offer him protection without loosing the grip and feel of batting. He is enjoying the color of the gloves as well. I Highly recommend this batting gloves. The value and fast shipping was worth every dollar!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glove. my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glove. my daughter loves it. very supple leather and feels thick as well so hopefully it will last more than 6 months like my daughter's other gloves.
customer_reviews.author: R. RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel. Always good quality from Franklin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kretzer

customer_reviews.title: Papi gloves
customer_reviews.text: They shipped fast and are very comfortable. Also when I used them they had great grip, and they look cool. I really like them and would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: The Iron Beast

customer_reviews.title: These don't last.
customer_reviews.text: In the past we purchased cheap gloves for our son who loves baseball. Those always lasted at least one season longer if there was no growth spurt. We thought since he was getting older and playing harder we should go with a more expensive pair- we were wrong. The gloves lasted two games then tore. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE GLOVES RIPPED....
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THESE GLOVES FOR MY SON WHO IS 14 YEARS OLD, THEY RIPPED AFTER USING THEM LESS THAN 10 TIMES. MY SON LIKES THE GLOVES, BUT THEY NEED TO LAST LONGER THAN 1/2 DAYS... TODD
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rodewald

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these but they did not hold up that great
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these but they did not hold up that great. We ordered another pair, custom, on the franklin website and those have held up much better. More expensive, but quality seems better.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: There’s a batting cage nearby and these gloves are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sean swentkowski

customer_reviews.title: No up to Franklin standards
customer_reviews.text: I have used CFX Pros for years. These "Signature" gloves lasted less than two games. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Got for nephew and within 6 weeks glive had hole. When went to return and over time limit. Price and quality do not match. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: These last.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Went through 40 games and still has plenty of life in them. Good Grip and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: schoonz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with how quickly it came
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son who just LOVES Big Papi. Very pleased with how quickly it came, the look on my son's face was priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome color way of a great batting glove. Probably a bit spendy relative to most standard Franklin colors, but the gloves last a whole season and then some.
customer_reviews.author: J. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Caused blisters and became worn after only a few times of use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Keinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the gloves, to bad they broke so fast. The gloves look very nice but it did not even lasted 2 months. My son plays travel baseball and plays many games I expected a better quality for the prize of this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Ctwice17

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and are exceptional quality
customer_reviews.text: My son outgrew his gloves and really wanted these David Ortiz gloves. They fit great and are exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Franklin Ortiz Gloves Home Run Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, comfortable, and like the ones that David Ortiz wears! What little Red Sox fan wouldn't want that?!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size are smaller than the others Franklin batting gloves
customer_reviews.author: jcterc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: had them not even a month and the one I wear only to bat is already ripping
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Betts

customer_reviews.title: These Have very nice grip, Do not recommend sliding with them They ...
customer_reviews.text: These Have very nice grip, Do not recommend sliding with them They rip very easily but Still recommended to High school players.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy rendon

customer_reviews.title: Adds Power?
customer_reviews.text: My kid had no power before getting these batting gloves and as soon as he put them on he started hitting home run after home run! It was amazing! Actually, I'm just kidding- my son says they are very comfortable, provide a good grip on the bat and the look cool.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Alba

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are nice, but mvp logo feel off right away.. Not very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Greg SinclAir

customer_reviews.title: He said they are extremely comfortable and great to use
customer_reviews.text: They did start to separate after the first use but my son was able to crazy glue the part together. He said they are extremely comfortable and great to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Azevedo

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports MLB CFX Pro Signature Series Batting Gloves (Cabrera/Cano/Ortiz)
product_meta.description: With these Franklin® youth CFXreg; Player Signature Series Robinson Cano batting gloves, he can blast one outta the park in the same model his favorite slugger wears! They're crafted with a one-piece Pittards® Digital sheepskin palm for exceptional grip in all weather conditions, while Tectonic fit inserts, a neoprene bridge and floating thumb tech combine to make them extremely flexible and comfortable.
feature_bullets: Floating thumb technology increases glove flexibility and adaptability
Neoprene bridge gives added flex across the knuckle back and side flex areas
Tectonic fit inserts accommodate flex without adding bulk to the back of the hand
QUAD-FLEX creasing decreases material buildup between your hand and the bat handle
One-piece leather palm maintains tactility and provides a smooth, seamless feel on any bat

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
